name: Aivale
description:
Follow the short adventure of a miner trying to find enough ores to help his mining home. and help me embark on his goal of finally seeing the outside world  

V Dev note V

This game is for my first-ever game jam. that I've tried to put enough stuff in the game to make it interesting with the limitation i have.

second note, due to issues on my end I had to rush a bit of the polishing. so not everything is top notch but still tried my best to make it interesting enough

On a side note although this game is very short. but this can be seen as a small prologue to a much bigger game in the future. as of right now

as of right now i used this as a time to gain experience and help me learn more about the program I am using.
